infotext.entitydescription.kazuyakumoradio: A radio Kazuya Kumo gave to you with a pre-configured frequency to call in a favor from her when docked to a separatist station.
infotext.entitydescription.duckysuit: A strange suit offered to you by your friend Jokster. It seems to be a custom modified PUCS suit with some swimming speed enhancements from the slipsuit.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_killmonster_regio: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Some fauna exclusive to this region is causing us massive trouble. I've sent all the details to your onboard navigation system, in case you're interested.”
infotext.missiondescription.killelectricspineling: A particularly aggressive Great Electric Spineling has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to those who kill the creature.
infotext.missionsuccess.killelectricspineling1: The Great Electric Spineling has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.killelectricspineling1: The Great Electric Spineling is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotext.missiondescription.killelectricspineling: A particularly aggressive pair of Great Electric Spinelings have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
infotext.missionsuccess.killelectricspineling2: The Great Electric Spinelings have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.killelectricspineling2: The Great Electric Spinelings are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotext.talentdescription.knowledgefrombeyond: Her dedication to her research has given her the knowledge to use alien materials to craft dementonite tools.
infotext.locationdescription.LairMudraptor: Local fauna spreading rapidly to nearby locations.
infotext.locationdescription.LairThresher: Local fauna spreading rapidly to nearby locations.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission1.c1: “We received multiple reports about a pirate vessel causing trouble. We need you to get rid of them by any means.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission2.c1: “We received multiple reports about a pirate vessel blasting music into the depths and luring more monsters close to our stations. We need you to get rid of them by any means.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission3.c1: “We recently lost contact to some of our vessels. We believe they got attacked by a strange vessel that was reported lurking around these parts. We need you to get rid of it to hopefully prevent other vessels getting lost in the future.”
infotext.eventtext.piratedivers.monitor: The status monitor suddenly displays something inside the airlock...
infotext.eventtext.huskencounter.monitor: The status monitor suddenly displays something inside the airlock...
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.monitor: The status monitor is displaying a warning about the engine malfunctioning. Better order a mechanic to take a look.
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine: The engine stopped working. Best to quickly get it back up and running.
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.success: You got the engine back up and running!
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.failure: The engine didn't start up. Try again?
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.smack.fa: A part fell off. Surely nothing important... Just give it a bit of time and it'll probably start back up.
infotext.eventtext.option.dontbother: Let someone else deal with this...
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.monitor: The status monitor is displaying a warning about a reactor malfunction. An engineer should probably take a look.
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor: The reactor is malfunctioning and building up pressure. This is a serious issue and should be dealt with immediatly!
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.suc: You resolved the issue and the reactor is returning to normal values!
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.fai: You failed to release the pressure. Try again?
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.sma: A part fell off. Let's hope it's nothing important...
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.huskbeer.success: "I see. Interesting choice. You might want to be careful with that stuff though... I heard it may contain parasites."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.clownbeer.succes: "One of those huh? Here you go."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.co.attack: "You're gonna pay today, Viva la revolution!"
infotext.eventtext.takeover.success: You hear someone tune into your frequency: "Enough! We yield! The station is yours... Just please stop with the bloodshed!"
infotext.eventtext.takeover.success.info: Leave the station to receive your reward.
infotext.eventtext.takeover.complete: "Great work! The station is now ours. We'll send some of our people there. It should be back up and running under our command in no time! For now you should leave the station. I'm sending you your reward..."
infotext.eventtext.takeover.attack: "We arrived! Make sure your weapons are loaded and safety is off! Let's do this!"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.general.isa: "We still have to take over the last station your crew was sent to before we can plan an attack on the next one."
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.h: "Ah good to see you! Your crew is doing great! We planned another attack. Would your crew mind lending a hand at taking over another separatist station nearby?"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.m: "Since your crew is doing good, we'd like to ask if your crew could aid us in another attack on a separatist station nearby?"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.l: "We have noticed your efforts to maintain a good reputation with us and would like to give your crew a chance to prove you're serious with us. Aid us in an attack on a separatist station nearby and you'll be working with our top men soon enough!"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.separatists: "Ah good to see you! Your crew is doing great! We planned another attack. Would your crew mind lending a hand at taking over another coalition station nearby?"
"Since your crew is doing good, we'd like to ask if your crew could aid us in another attack on a coalition station nearby?"

"We have noticed your efforts to maintain a good reputation with us and would like to give your crew a chance to prove you're serious with us. Aid us in an attack on a coalition station nearby and you'll be working with our top men soon enough!"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.option.acce: "Yes we would like to help. Which station is our target?"
"Here, I'll mark it on your map... We've also ordered some of our soldiers to assist you and your crew during the attack. They'll be joining you in just a moment."
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.option.decl: "Sorry, but we currently got other business to take care of first."
"Alright. Let me know when you dealt with your business or if you change your mind."
infotext.eventtext.piratemissionbroadcast.receive: "Yarhahar, what do we have here? Me eyes spied some good loot! Hope ye came prepared..."
infotext.eventtext.cocargobroadcast.receive: You're receiving a transmission from another vessel. What do you want to do?
infotext.eventtext.cocargobroadcast.receive.accep: "This is CO-CT-43. State your business in this area immediately!"
(Tell the truth) "We're here to rob you obviously... Get ready to be boarded!"
"At least your honest... *EVERYONE GET TO YOUR STATIONS! WE GOT HOSTILES INCOMING*"
(Tell a lie) "We have official orders from Admiral Edward to check your cargo for potential stowaways. Please cooperate with us and stop your submarine."
"Oh Admiral Edward? Yes we'll stop our vessel immediately! Welcome on board!"
"How stupid do you think we are? There is no Admiral Edward! Whoever you are, we suggest to turn around and get out of our way or face the consequences."
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.meltdown: The reactor is buckling and whining with pressure, what do you do?
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.meltdown.opt: The reactor shudders, but you hear the steam whistle out of the core. It seems someone wired something to it...
The reactor gurgles as the steam swells the protective hoses leaving the core, it seems a qualified engineer is required.
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.smellofsulfu: The smell of sulfur burns your nostrils...
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.hiddenstash: Hidden in the walls, you notice a small metal box glimmers.
You find a note stashed in a detonator with detailed instructions on what needs to be done for democracy.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.offerdrink.nodrunk: "Looks like you could use a drink."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.offerdrink.slightdru: "Looks like you could use another drink."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.success.slig: "Still got more were that came from."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.success.drun: "Let me see you down this one next!"
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.failure: "We only hold tabs for the locals, bring me some money first."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.tip.success: "I will trade you a tip for a tip; check out this signal once you undock, it might be worth something."
infotext.eventtext.bartender.tip.failure: "I wish compliments paid the bills man, thanks anyway."
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent: A pirate has stopped and is looking at you like he is waiting for you to do something. What will you do?
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent.option.igno: You don't care and go on with your business.
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent.option.atta: "I really don't like the looks of you filthy pirate scum... Time for pest control!"
"It's time to send you all to hell!"
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.piratehaven: The station is trying to establish a connection...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.piratehaven.answer: Hey! Are ye stupid? Thought we don't check who's dockin'? Well think again asshole! Y'all are with the coalition! Don't ye even think about settin' foot on this outpost or ye'll regret it, dickheads! Get lost!
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.monster: You are picking up a strange radio signal, it might be worth investigating...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.monster.answer: Haunting howls echo off the hull, something must be emitting these strange signals.
Screeching shrills send shivers down your spine, something must be emitting these strange signals.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.wreck: You are picking up an automated distress signal, it might be worth investigating...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.wreck.answer: You're receiving an SOS broadcast from somewhere near your current location.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.ruin: You're picking up an alien signal, it might be worth investigating...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.ruin.answer: An eerie whirring whistle awakens a deep fear, something must be emitting these strange signals.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.closetosignal: The strange radio signal grows stronger, it must be nearby...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.generic.decline: "We don't have time for this now."
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.separatist: A rugged freedom fighter leaps out of the crate, all while waving a firearm wildly.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.coalition.good: It appears this is a missplaced shipment of another captains items. Nice!
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.coalition.bad: The crate contained a small letter with a coalition seal. It contains a fine, tough luck.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.cultist: The stench of rotting flesh is followed by a rusted diving suit starting to stand up out of the box.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.clown: A dastardly grinning harlequin greets your gaze with a smile, drool drips from under his mask.
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.interact: You approach a seemingly scared civilian. What will you do?
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.rob: "You either hand over all your money quickly or you'll not walk out of here alive!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire: "Join us or die like the others!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire.suc: "Ok ok! I'll do anything, but please don't hurt me!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire.fai: "I'd rather die than join some filthy pirates!"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.interact: A collection of fliers dot the wall, each with a reward. Which one do you pick up?
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.piratemissio: You think to yourself: "The coalition really needs people to do their dirty work anonymously."
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.monstermissi: -LOCAL FAUNA CAUSING HAVOC - WE PAY FOR THEIR DEMISE-
You think to yourself: "Someone really needs to clean out these dangerous critters."
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.miningmissio: -LOCAL CAVE MIGHT CONTAIN MINERAL DEPOSITS - WE PAY FOR PROOF OF THEIR EXISTENCE-
You think to yourself: "A bit of honest mining work, what could go wrong?"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.cargomission: You think to yourself: "To be quite frank, I don’t give two shits about any speed limits!"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.salvagemissi: -A SIGNAL APPEARED IN A LOCAL CAVE - WE PAY ANYONE WHO INVESTIGATES AND RETRIEVES WHAT THEY FIND-
You think to yourself: "I am sure there will be something to scrap down there!"
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.interact: "I have some spare materials here, looking to buy? You may choose only 1 though!"
"You can smell the fabricator still on it."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.option.extinguis: "You're really hurting if a fire breaks out."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.unfriedly: "We're not gonna help the likes of you."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.attack: "You're gonna pay today, Viva la revolution!"
infotext.eventtext.shop.quartermaster.interact: "I've got some surplus welding fuel, if you need to resupply."
infotext.eventtext.shop.quartermaster.option.scra: "Got this from a wreck not far from here, let me add it to your map..."
"It's not trash to me son, pay up."
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.interact: "I've got surplus ammo, if you're looking to resupply, but I can only sell you 1 package!"
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.option.co: "This ammo isn't a hand me out."
infotext.eventtext.securityofficer.bribe.option.r: "So you wanna do this the hard way, huh?"
infotext.eventtext.securityofficer.bribe.option.b: "On second thought, you're not the guy I was looking for."
"Are you trying to bribe me with that puny amount?"
"What did you just say to me!? I'll file a report if you don't stop with that!"
infotext.eventtext.shop.piratesecurityofficer.int: "I've got some fuckin' firepower if you're looking to load up. I'll sell ya one package of your choosing."
infotext.eventtext.shop.piratesecurityofficer.opt: "This will cut through any coalition body armor, a mantis, and even moloch armor I swear."
"These are made with hatred and loaded with malicious intent, assault responsibly."
"Did you just blow in from the abandoned station too? I need a lil money here."
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.toll.low: "Ya know we don't just let everyone walk right in. There's a fuckin' toll! Word of advice: It's better to pay up!"
"Hah! That's what I like to see. No hassle whatsoever!"
"You know what... If you pay double, I'll spread a few good words about your crew among the other crews!"
"Dude you don't even got the scratch... Trying to fuck me over? Get lost!"
"Pff! Fine... Go on licking coalition boots!"
"You don't even have the money? Surely you own something worth my time."
"Really now? You fuckin' with me, right? Alright fine! Go in..."
"Oh I have a better proposition for you..."
"Your crying amuses me... Dont you say another word and get outta my sight."
"Your pitiful excuse of a story isn't gonna save you!"
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.toll.hig: "Oh what do we have here? Coalition scum!? Ya know there's a fuckin' TOLL! Pay up dumbass!"
"Imma give you a special offer now. Pay me double and I'll spread some really good words about your crew amongst the other crews here."
"Hm didn't expect you to actually pay. Alright I'll spread some cool rumors about your crew. Coalition won't like it if they hear it, hehe."
"You coalition folks are retarted as hell. Can't even keep track of their fuckin' money. Get lost!"
"Should've guessed. You're just a shitty loyal boot licker. Get the hell out of my sight!"
"You don't even have the money? Surely you coalition folks own something worth my time."
"Make it quick pig, or I will."
"I was expecting something more from someone like you... Come here!"
"You know what? Forget about it! You're a goner!"
"Haha hey boys! Look at this whiny shitbag! ...Alright you made me laugh so go in, before I change my mind!"
"You fuckin' kiddin' me!? Imma take everything from your fuckin' corpse!"
"Your pitiful excuse of a story isn't gonna save you, nor can your coalition buddies help you here! Say you're last words!"
infotext.eventtext.piratemissioninformant.interac: "Hm? Ye lookin' for work ye say? Lemme tell ya somethin'! Ain't no administration service here! But... Got me a lead about a coalition transport passing near here and I'm not sure if me crew is ready for it. Imma sell it to ya if ye got the cash!"
"Hah great! Lemme show ya where they gonna pass!"
"Ain't gonna give it to ya for free dumbass! Come back when ye got the scratch!"
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.c1: "COALITION BOUNTY ISSUED", the discolored and damaged posters list off sites of destruction and infestation, seems like the coalition is in over their heads. You can only make out one set of coordinates.
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.o1: A tax free paycheck couldn't hurt...
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_lair.c1: “There is a massive lair nearby bubbling over with more and more creatures by the minute, if you can take it out there is a reward in it for you!”
infotext.entitydescription.commsrelayDE: A radio communication relay device which allows you to receive radio signals and communication.
infotext.entitydescription.giantrubberduck: A giant rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.bigrubberduck: A big rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.rubberduck: A rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.giantpiraterubberduck: A giant rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.bigpiraterubberduck: A big rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.piraterubberduck: A rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitPA: A heavily modified exosuit. It seems some pirates are quite crafty and managed to increase the stun resistance of this exosuit and allow the user to breath hull oxygen if available.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitplayerPA: A heavily modified exosuit. It seems some pirates are quite crafty and managed to increase the stun resistance of this exosuit and allow the user to breath hull oxygen if available.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitpartsPA: Damaged parts from a modified pirate exosuit.
infotext.entitydescription.dirtybombPA: An hand-crafted radioactive bomb to put inside a detonator, railgun ammunition or a depthcharge. Better keep your distance!
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesnovicePA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit is mostly given to new hires and crew in lower positions.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesPA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit has been improved with light armor plating.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclotheshardPA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit is worn by more experienced crew members and higher-ups to protect them during combat.
infotext.missionmessage0.coalitiontakeover: Seems like the separatists had enough.
infotext.missionmessage0.separatisttakeover: Seems like the coalition is giving this station up.
infotext.missiondescription.coalition_cargotrap: A coalition cargo vessel is passing through. Eliminate their crew and loot their ship!
infotext.missionsuccess.coalition_cargotrap: You successfully eliminated the coalition crew!
infotext.missionfailure.coalition_cargotrap: You didn't kill the coalition crew!
infotext.missionmessage0.coalition_cargotrap: Oh no! It seems like this was a trap... It's an attack vessel!
infotext.missionmessage1.coalition_cargotrap: Loot their vessel first or continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.stealingintel: The Jovian Separatists have tasked you to steal classified documents from the Coalition to gain more intel on their operations.
infotext.missionsuccess.stealingintel: The documents have been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionmessage0.stealingintel: You've found the classified documents. Best to get out of there quickly before someone notices.
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.mudraptorlair: Mudraptors are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair: Threshers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.huskcrawlerlair: Husked Crawlers are spreading rapidly at [location1]. We can't let this spread further! Help us to get rid of them by shooting every single one you can find in that cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.huskcrawlerlair: The husked crawlers have been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcrawlerlair: "Wow good job! Seems like you succesfully killed every single one of them in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.wasteyard: Too many vessels found their demise at [location1] and all their toxic waste leaking into the ocean has turned the local fauna into extra dangerous creatures. We can't let them spread this infection further! Help us to get rid of them by shooting every single one and destroying every egg you can find at that wasteyard.
infotext.missionmessage0.wasteyard: "Didn't think you'd get there out alive! Seems like you got them all. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.coalition_cargo2: A coalition cargo vessel is passing through. Eliminate their crew and loot their ship!
infotext.missionsuccess.coalition_cargo2: You successfully dealt with the coalition crew!
infotext.missionfailure.coalition_cargo2: You didn't deal with the coalition crew!
infotext.missionmessage0.coalition_cargo2: Time to deal with them! They got the loot you want!
infotext.missionmessage1.coalition_cargo2: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.gotorandomencounter: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.gotorandomencounter: You decided to investigate the strange alien signal.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvageskyhold: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvageskyholderar: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvageskyholdera: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagethermal: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagethermalarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagethermalart: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagethermal: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagethermalarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagethermalart: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagenasonov: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagenasonovarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagenasonovart: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmoloch: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmoloch: Signal investigated and the Moloch has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmoloch: Turns out the signal was coming from that Moloch.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmolochblac: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmolochblack: Signal investigated and the Moloch has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmolochblack: Turns out the signal was coming from that Moloch.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killlargecrawl: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killlargecrawler: Signal investigated and the Crawlers have been killed.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killtigerthres: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killtigerthresher: Signal investigated and the Tiger Thresher has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killtigerthresher: Turns out the signal was coming from that Tiger Thresher.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerbroodm: Turns out the signal was coming from that Broodmother.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerswarm1: Turns out the signal was coming from that swarm.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1l: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1h: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm2: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerswarm2: Turns out the signal was coming from that swarm.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killhammerhead: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead_bas: Signal investigated and the Hammerhead has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead_ba: Turns out the signal was coming from that Hammerhead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killhammerhead: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killhammerhead: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead2: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead2: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmatriarch1: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmatriarch1: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been neutralized. The route should be safe again.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmatriarch1: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmatriarch2: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmatriarch2: Signal investigated and the Matriarch has been killed. The route should be safe again.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmatriarch2: Turns out the signal was coming from that Matriarch.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerheadgold: Signal investigated and the Golden Hammerhead is dead.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killgiantspineling: Signal investigated and the Giant Spineling is dead.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killgiantspineling: Signal investigated and the Giant Spineling is dead.

infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmudraptors1: Turns out the signal was coming from those Mudraptors.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmudraptors2: Signal investigated and the Mudraptors are dead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagewreck1: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagewreck1: Signal investigated and the Logbook has been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagewreck1: Turns out the signal was coming from that logbook containing some encrypted data.
infotext.missiondescription.random_pirate_heavy: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_pirate_heavy: Signal investigated and the pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_pirate_heavy: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_heavy: Turns out the signal was coming from those pirates. Maybe they got loot on board? Navigate your submarine to [location2] when you're ready to leave.
infotext.missiondescription.random_pirate_party: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.random_pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_pirate_party: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_party: Turns out the signal was coming from those pirates. Maybe they got loot on board? Navigate your submarine to [location2] when you're ready to leave.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_heavy: Seek out the pirate vessel that has been terrorizing this area and eliminate its crew, but keep in mind these pirates managed to strengthen their hull so you either pack heavy firepower or aim for the doors and hatches! The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_heavy: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_heavy: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_heavy: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_heavy: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_party: There were sightings of a pirate vessel attacking other vessels and stealing all their ethanol and rum while blasting music so loud they'll drag all of europa's monsters to our doorstep. Get rid of those drunken dickheads so we don't have to deal with things far worse than them. The marked locations show where we suspect the ship to be.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_party: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_party: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_piezo: We've heard rumors about a pirate vessel with strange capabilities around this area. Apparently they create some sort of anomaly to protect themselves, so you might want to keep your submarine at a safe distance! The marked locations show where we suspect the ship to be.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_piezo: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_piezo: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_piezo: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_piezo: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_lord: There has been talk about a pirate lord's vessel that has been terrorizing this area. Eliminate it's crew and you'll be rewarded handsomely! But keep in mind this is a pirate lord's vessel! They have very strong hulls and pack heavy firepower so be prepared! The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_lord: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_lord: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_lord: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_lord: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

infotext.locationdescription.Lair: Local fauna spreading rapidly to nearby locations.
infotext.locationdescription.HuskgroundsDE: A hotspot of fauna infected with the husk parasite spreading rapidly.
infotext.locationdescription.WasteyardDE: A hotspot of fauna infected with the Waste-Infection spreading quickly.
infotext.locationdescription.waypoint: A location clear of obstacles and monsters. Ready to be colonized.
infotext.locationdescription.PirateNone: Pirates are taking apart the abandoned outpost to build a new haven from its pieces.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.set: The constructions of a new settlement at [previousname] are now concluded. More settlers are moving into their new homes.
infotext.locationchange.survey.changeto.extractio: Surveys at [previousname] found a mineral deposit and workers are now beginning the excavation.
infotext.locationchange.hydroponics.changeto.bios: The hydroponics at [previousname] upgraded their facilities into a biosphere to provide enough meat for local stations.
infotext.locationchange.abandoned.changeto.pirate: Pirates are taking apart the abandoned outpost and build a new haven from its pieces.
infotext.locationchange.biosphere.changeto.nouris: The biosphere of [previousname] was successfully upgraded to a nourishment facility.
infotext.locationchange.study.changeto.lab: Studies at [previousname] were concluded and the facility was upgraded to research laboratories.
infotext.locationchange.settlement.changeto.outpo: The Colonists at [previousname] have expanded the colony to hold more people.
infotext.locationchange.lab.changeto.research: More researchers are drawn towards [previousname] and are founding an institute.
infotext.locationchange.excavation.changeto.mine: Excavation at [previousname] has finished and workers are now starting a mine.
infotext.locationchange.hospital.changeto.surgery: The hospital of [previousname] was successfully upgraded to a surgery center.
infotext.locationchange.clinic.changeto.hospital: The clinic of [previousname] was in need for more capacity so they upgraded it into a hospital.
infotext.locationchange.outpost.changeto.abandone: We have lost contact with [previousname] unexpectedly. We advise you to investigate with caution.
The beacon station nearby [previousname] recieved an automated SOS broadcast from the station, but no further communication has been recieved.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. No survivors have been found.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. Survivors are being extracted via shuttle.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.waypoint: [previousname] has a good chunk of space to set up an outpost.
The Coalition has marked [previousname] as a good location to colonize.
infotext.locationchange.lair.changeto.none: [previousname] has been cleared out by the surrounding coalition military forces.
infotext.locationchange.UnderAttack.changeto.bloc: The Coalition is setting up a blockade at [previousname].
The Coalition is moving troops to [previousname].
The Coalition is garrisoning troops at [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.colony.changeto.settlemen: The Colonists at [previousname] have expanded the colony to hold more people.
infotext.locationchange.colony.changeto.construct: The Colonists at [previousname] have started construction on the station.
The Colonists at [previousname] have started working on making amenities.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.hyd: The Engineers at [previousname] have finished wiring the hydroponics bay.
The Mechanics at [previousname] have finished welding on a hydroponics bay.
[previousname] is now growing crops for the surrounding area.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.fac: The Engineers at [previousname] have finished setting up the fabricators.
The Mechanics at [previousname] have started production on consumer goods.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.cam: Coalition Security Forces have started setting up a base at [previousname].
[previousname] is being controlled by the coalition.
A Coalition camp is being set up at [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.stu: A study of the area around [previousname] showed there is lots of exotic life in the region.
[previousname] noticed a facinating floral specimen growing in the cavern.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.sur: A survey of the area around [previousname] showed that valuable ore is present.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.fus: Engineers and Scientists at [previousname] have finished the fusion power plant.
[previousname] now provides fusion power to the surrounding area.
The cooling turbine for the fusion power plant at [previousname] is complete.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.shi: Engineers and Mechanics at [previousname] have started selling ship and ship parts.
The Shipyard at [previousname] has finished construction.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.cli: Medical Treatment is now available at [previousname].
[previousname] has set up a small infirmary.
A clinic has finished being built at [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.base.changeto.military: Coalition Forces have set up an massive fortress at [previousname].
Coalition Forces are mobilizing out of [previousname].
[previousname] has become a fortress to defend nearby stations.
Coalition Forces have set up an massive fortress at [previousname].
Coalition Forces are mobilizing out of [previousname].
[previousname] has become a fortress to defend nearby stations.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.pirateoutpo: Pirates established a new haven at [previousname].
Pirates ventured into [previousname] and established a new haven.
infotext.talentdescription.stayingtipsy: You provided her with alcohol, now live with the consequences.
infotext.afflictiondescription.temporarycrew.othe: Will leave your crew after 6 hours from the moment they joined.
infotext.afflictiondescription.temporarycrew.self: I'm here to support this crew for 6 hours from the moment I arrived. No more, no less.
infotext.EventText.missionevent.piratevscoalition: We heard there's a coalition vessel passing by near here. Maybe they got some goods you can take, if you know what I mean?
infotext.EventText.missionevent.piratevsseparatis: Some separatists seem to be traveling around these waters. Maybe they got some goods you can take, if you know what I mean?
infotext.lockedpathtooltippirate: Pirates have found a way around the blockades to the deeper zones of Europa. Listen around the station to find out how to get past the blockades.
infotext.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridgepirate.c: “Hm? Secret passage? Ohhh right! We found a tunnel that leads past the blockades. Here I'll show it on your map... Be careful though! There might be vessels patrolling!”
infotext.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateaupirate: “Oh you're here to get past the blockades? Give me your map... Alright, here's where you can find a tunnel to get past them, but be careful! There might be patrols along the way! Good luck out there!”
infotext.eventtext.unlockpathgreatseapirate.c1: “Ahoy! You're probably looking to get past the blockades, right? There's a tunnel leading past them. Here, I'll mark it on your map... Keep an eye out for patrolling vessels though!”
infotext.missiondescription.trespassing_coalition: You are trespassing. Keep an eye out for patrolling Coalition vessels in this area!
infotext.missionsuccess.trespassing_coalition: You successfully eliminated the Coalition patrol!
infotext.missionfailure.trespassing_coalition: You successfully dodged the Coalition patrol!
infotext.missionmessage0.trespassing_coalition: Escape the patrol, or neutralize the thread!
infotext.missionmessage1.trespassing_coalition: You can now continue your way towards [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_vscoalition: Hunt down the coalition vessel, eliminate their crew and loot their goods! The marked locations show where the ship might be headed.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_vscoalition: The coalition vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_vscoalition: The coalition vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_vscoalition: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_vscoalition: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_vsseparatists: Hunt down the separatist vessel, eliminate their crew and loot their goods! The marked locations show where the ship might be headed.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_vsseparatists: The separatist vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_vsseparatists: The separatist vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_vsseparatists: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_vsseparatists: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
